short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks the size and aspect ratio of images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Image Size Checker" is a browser extension designed to help web developers and designers ensure the optimal use of images on their web pages.

Key Features:

Size Recommendations: Determines the optimal size for images based on their file type and dimensions, alerting you if an image exceeds the recommended file size.

Aspect Ratio Checker: Detects any mismatch between the rendered aspect ratio of an image and its intrinsic aspect ratio, ensuring images display as intended.

In-page Warnings: Provides immediate, on-page feedback by bordering problematic images in red and providing detailed warning messages, making it easy to identify and address issues.

Quick Image Info: Hover over any image to see its file size, aiding in quick assessments without digging into developer tools.

Harness the power of "Image Size Checker" to optimize the images on your site, improve loading times, and enhance the user experience.
